kalimat_besemah: Mpuq jeme rami, die masih njeling saje nga Sulha
kalimat_indonesia: Walaupun orang ramai, dia masih melirik terus kepada Sulha
kalimat_inggris: Though there were many people, he still kept glancing at Sulha
His eyes were wide-open and couldn’t be closed

kata_inggris: the dirt, dung eyes, etc. attached
on a stick, a lot of stick

kalimat_inggris: Wash your face first, Son. Dirt eyes is still stuck on

kalimat_indonesia: Anaknya yang bungsu itu memang aneh
kalimat_inggris: Their youngest child is really different

kalimat_besemah: Ngape dengah njelune ni awaq gi mude, payu kerencal dikit
kalimat_indonesia: Kenapa engkau tampak lesu padahal masih muda, ayuh bersemangat sedikit
kalimat_inggris: Why do you seem lethargic while still young, let's get a little excited

kata_inggris: a type of tree that produces lots of sap as material for Styrofoam

kalimat_inggris: In Friday night, we usually read Yasin
